title: David Moyes Backing Rooney To Become Man Utd Midfield Maestro
content:
It has been reported that former Manchester United and Everton boss David Moyes believes Wayne Rooney will master the midfield in years to come. 
 

 
Moyes suggested that Rooney can prolong his football career by playing in midfield in the later years of his career at Old Trafford. 
 
He told BBC Radio 5Live : “I think while he is probably England’s best striker at the moment, he has to continue playing as a striker and scoring goals. 
 
“But I could genuinely see Wayne being a midfield player for a year or two after that – I think he has got that ability when his legs run out a bit. 
 
“He is such a good footballer and passer of the ball that he could play in other positions and it could be that he steps back (positionally) in time. 
 
“He has played top football for 12 or 13 years and not many players have had careers as long as that and played as many games. 
 
“Wayne has got many miles on the clock but I do think he can go on a bit longer.”
